verbs.description: [ARG0: The Mexican government] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] [V: condemned] [ARG2: as “ cruel and inhuman] ” [ARG1: the Trump administration policy of separating immigrant families detained on U.S. soil] .
The Mexican government on Tuesday condemned as “ cruel and inhuman ” the Trump administration policy of [V: separating] [ARG1: immigrant families detained on U.S. soil] .
